Name: Avocado Toast

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
Melt butter in a skillet over medium-low heat.

Crack eggs into the skillet side by side and cook until eggs are white on the bottom layer and firm enough to flip, 2 to 3 minutes.

Steps.Name: Next step
Steps.Description: Flip eggs, trying not to crack the yolk, and cook until the egg reaches desired doneness, 2 to 4 minutes more.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Meanwhile, toast bread slices to desired doneness, 3 to 4 minutes.

Name: Fresh Salad Thaid

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
Cut all your vegetables to size.

You can also use a bag of pre-shredded coleslaw.

I diced the English cucumbers and cut the red bell peppers into thin strips.

You may also use julienne carrots, lettuce, etc.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Place the dressing ingredients in a jar and shake together until well combined.

Add the mix salad greens first, then strategically place the carrot, onion, red pepper and cucumber around the mixed greens.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Finish up with the dressing.

Add the dressing just before you want to serve the salad otherwise it'll go soggy.

Name: Salmon Tomato Sauce

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Whenever I have fresh spinach in the house, I love wilting it into the sauce during the final few minutes of cooking to add some greens to this dish.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: If you happy to have any other Italian herbs in the house (rosemary, oregano, thyme, etc), feel free to add them in to taste

Steps.Name: Third step
Steps.Description:
Instead of (or — if you’re feeling extra-indulgent — in addition to) the heavy cream, add in a torn ball of fresh burrata to the dish just before serving.

I can vouch that it is heavenly.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
I have to admit that I really prefer the texture/flavor of this dish using fresh tomatoes.

But if you’re in a pinch, it will also taste great using one large (28-ounce) can of good-quality whole tomatoes, which you can break up with a wooden spoon as they cook.

Name: Fresh Salad Pasta

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.

Cook pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 10 to 12 minutes; rinse under cold water and drain.

Steps.Name: Next step
Steps.Description: Whisk Italian dressing and salad spice mix together until smooth

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Combine pasta, tomatoes, bell peppers, and olives in a salad bowl; pour dressing over salad and toss to coat.

Refrigerate salad, 8 hours to overnight.

Name: Circle Cake

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
Position a rack in the middle of the oven and preheat to 350 degrees.

While the oven is heating, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a bowl, mixing well.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
Place the butter and sugar in the bowl of a heavy-duty mixer fitted with the paddle attachment and beat on medium speed for about 5 minutes, or until very soft and light.

Beat in the vanilla.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Bake the layers for about 30 to 35 minutes, until they are well risen and firm and a toothpick inserted in the center emerges clean.

Cool the layers in the pans on racks for 5 minutes, then unmold onto racks to finish cooling right side up.

Name: Mom's Cheesecake

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
In the bowl of a stand mixer or in a large bowl (using a hand mixer) add cream cheese and stir until smooth and creamy (don’t over-beat or you’ll incorporate too much air).

Add sugar and stir again until creamy.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Add sour cream, vanilla extract, and salt, and stir until well-combined.

If using a stand mixer, make sure you pause periodically to scrape the sides and bottom of the bowl with a spatula so that all ingredients are evenly incorporated

Steps.Name: Third step
Steps.Description:
With mixer on low speed, gradually add lightly beaten eggs, one at a time, stirring just until each egg is just incorporated.

Once all eggs have been added, use a spatula to scrape the sides and bottom of the bowl again and make sure all ingredients are well combined.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Transfer to the center rack of your oven and bake on 325F (160C) for about 75 minutes.

Edges will likely have slightly puffed and may have just begun to turn a light golden brown and the center should spring back to the touch but will still be Jello-jiggly.

Don't over-bake or the texture will suffer, which means we all suffer.

Remove from oven and allow to cool on top of the oven³ for 10 minutes.

Once 10 minutes has passed, use a knife to gently loosen the crust from the inside of the springform pan (this will help prevent cracks as your cheesecake cools and shrinks).

Details: Awesome as a mom gift

Name: Fluffy French Toast

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
Measure flour into a large mixing bowl.

Slowly whisk in milk.

Whisk in eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and salt until smooth.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium heat.

Soak bread slices in milk mixture until saturated.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Working in batches, cook bread on the preheated griddle or pan until golden brown on each side.

Serve hot.

Details: Good to have a pretty nice breakfast

Name: Super Duper Oatmeal

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
Bring the milk and water to a boil in a bowl.

Combine flours, oats, dried cranberries and apricots, baking powder, and salt in a large mixing bowl.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Mix in the oats, and reduce heat to medium.

Stir in blueberries, applesauce, wheat germ, cinnamon, and sugar.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Cook 8 to 10 minutes, or until oats are tender.

As they finish, put them on a plate and hold in the oven while cooking remaining oats.

Details: Very special dessert to taste.

Name: Walnut and nuts

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description:
In a bowl, combine flour and sugar.

Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.

Combine egg yolks and milk; stir into flour mixture until blended.

With lightly floured hands, press dough onto the bottom and 1 in.

Steps.Name: Second Step
Steps.Description:
Up the sides of a 12-in.

Tart pan with removable bottom.

Line unpricked crust with a double thickness of heavy-duty foil.

Fill with pie weights.

Place pan on a baking sheet.

Bake at 375° until edges are lightly browned, 12-15 minutes.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Meanwhile, in a saucepan, combine the sugar, cream, cinnamon and salt.

Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.

Remove from the heat; stir in walnuts.

Remove foil from crust; pour filling into crust.

Bake until golden brown, 20-25 minutes.

Cool on a wire rack.

Store in the refrigerator.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Walnuts recipe to get very taste dessert

Name: Avocado Salad

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: In a small mixing bowl whisk together lemon juice, red wine vinegar, extra virgin oil oil, honey, garlic.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: After whisk, to get better taste pour cilantro, parsley, oregano, and season with salt and pepper.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: In a large bowl gently toss together cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, avocado with dressing.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Avocado salad recipe is a very healthy meal to loss weight

Name: Croissants

Steps.Name: Getting started
Steps.Description: Twenty-four hours before serving, start the détrempe: In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the dough hook, combine the flour, sugar, salt and yeast, and stir to combine.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Create a well in the center, and pour in the water and milk.

Mix on low speed until a tight, smooth dough comes together around the hook, about 5 minutes.

Remove the hook and cover the bowl with a damp towel.

Set aside for 10 minutes.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Reattach the dough hook and turn the mixer on medium-low speed.

Add the butter pieces all at once and continue to mix, scraping down the bowl and hook once or twice, until the dough has formed a very smooth, stretchy ball that is not the least bit sticky, 8 to 10 minutes.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Crossiant recipe to get very taste after lunch

Name: Strawberry Cream Pie

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: In a medium bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups of all-purpose flour and 1/2 cup of cold butter.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Use a fork or pastry cutter to blend the butter into the flour until it resembles coarse crumbs.

Slowly add in 1/4 cup of ice water, 1 tablespoon at a time, and mix until the dough comes together.

Roll out the dough on a floured surface to fit your pie dish and press it into the bottom and up the sides.

Prick the crust all over with a fork and preheat the oven to 375F.

Bake the crust for 15-20 minutes, or until lightly golden brown.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
In a medium saucepan, mix together 1 cup of heavy cream, 1/2 cup of granulated sugar, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract.

Heat the mixture over medium heat, whisking constantly, until it comes to a simmer.

In a small bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons of cornstarch and 2 tablespoons of cold water to make a slurry.

Slowly pour the slurry into the saucepan and continue to whisk until the mixture thickens.

Remove from heat and stir in 2 cups of sliced strawberries.

Pour the filling into the cooled crust and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Strawberry Cream Pie recipe is an awusome dessert to eat in any moment

Name: Teriyaki Salmon

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: Combine sauce ingredients and stir until brown sugar is dissolved.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Place individual salmon slices in a mixing bowl.

Pour the sauce over the salmon, cover with plastic wrap and let marinate 20 minutes (at room temp or refrigerated).

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Transfer salmon to prepared baking sheet (keep the marinade).

Bake at 400 for 12-16 minutes or until salmon is flaky and cooked through, bake times may vary by thickness and cut of salmon (see notes on how long to bake salmon below).

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Teriyaki Salmon is a high protein food with lots of nutrients

Name: Air Fryer French Fries

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: We just wash the potatoes and keep the skins on, but you can peel if you prefer.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
Clean the potatoes and cut into about 1/4 inch strands, making sure all the strands are the same size for even cooking.

Rinse the fries under cold water and pat dry.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Add the fries into a bowl and drizzle with oil and toss, season and toss again.

Evenly spread the fries into the air fryer basket.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Cook the fries until crispy and golden, tossing half way.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Air Fryer French Fries is a delicious plate and more healthy that normal fries

Name: Hasselback Potatoes

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description: Preheat the oven to 425ºF

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
Set a potato on a cutting board and place a chopstick on either side of the potato.

With a sharp, thin knife, make deep vertical cuts 1/8-inch apart, but without cutting all the way through the potato.

The chopsticks should keep you from accidentally cutting too deeply or going all the way through.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Place the potatoes with the cut side up in the baking dish, spaced a little apart so each one has some room.

Fan the potatoes open slightly.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Or until golden and crispy.

The potatoes will fan out more during cooking and take on their accordion-like appearance.

Serve hot.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Hasselback Potatoes is a delicious plate

Name: Stir-Fry Chicken and Vegetables

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description:
In a large pan on medium-high heat, add 1 tablespoon of oil.

Once the oil is hot, add chicken, season with salt and pepper, and sauté until cooked through and browned.

Remove cooked chicken from pan and set aside.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
In the same pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil and add mushrooms.

When the mushrooms start to soften, add broccoli florets and stir-fry until the broccoli is tender.

Remove cooked mushrooms and broccoli from the pan and set aside

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Add 1 tablespoon of oil to the pan and sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.

Add the remaining sauce ingredients and stir until smooth.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description: Return the chicken and vegetables to the saucy pan, stir until heated through.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Stir-Fry Chicken and Vegetables low calories meal

Name: Spicy Salmon and Vegetables

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description:
Preheat the broiler to low heat.

Whisk together the chili garlic sauce, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of sesame oil, sugar and vinegar until combined.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
Add the cut up salmon to the bowl and mix until coated.

Line a cookie sheet with Non-Stick Foil and evenly spread out the salmon and cook under the broiler for 8 to 10 minutes or until browned and cooked throughout.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description: Pour the remaining 1 tablespoon of sesame oil into a large frying pan on high heat and add in the bell peppers, snow peas and carrot and stir-fry for 3 to 4 minutes. Finish the vegetables by adding the remaining 1 tablespoon of soy sauce.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Divide the rice into 4 portions and serve the cooked salmon and vegetables evenly.

Optional Servings: Serve with a hard boiled egg or a fried egg.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Spicy Salmon and Vegetables is a protein meal with low calories

Name: Tomato and garlic pasta

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description:
Preheat the broiler to low heat.

Whisk together the chili garlic sauce, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of sesame oil, sugar and vinegar until combined.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
Add the cut up salmon to the bowl and mix until coated.

Line a cookie sheet with Non-Stick Foil and evenly spread out the salmon and cook under the broiler for 8 to 10 minutes or until browned and cooked throughout.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Pour the remaining 1 tablespoon of sesame oil into a large frying pan on high heat and add in the bell peppers, snow peas and carrot and stir-fry for 3 to 4 minutes.

Finish the vegetables by adding the remaining 1 tablespoon of soy sauce.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Divide the rice into 4 portions and serve the cooked salmon and vegetables evenly.

Optional Servings: Serve with a hard boiled egg or a fried egg.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Tomato and garlic pasta good mix between carbs and vegetables

Name: Homemade lasagna

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description:
Put a large pot of salted water (1 tablespoon of salt for every 2 quarts of water) on the stovetop on high heat.

It can take a while for a large pot of water to come to a boil (this will be your pasta water), so prepare the sauce in the next steps while the water is heating.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
In a large skillet heat 2 teaspoons of olive oil on medium-high heat.

Add the ground beef and cook until it is lightly browned on all sides.

Remove the beef with a slotted spoon to a bowl.

Drain off all but a tablespoon of fat.

Steps.Name: Second step
Steps.Description:
Add the diced bell pepper and onions to the skillet (in the photo we are using yellow bell pepper and red onions).

Cook for 4 to 5 minutes, until the onions are translucent and the peppers softened.

Add the minced garlic and cook half a minute more.

Return the browned ground beef to the pan.

Stir to combine, reduce the heat to low, and cook for another 5 minutes.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Cover the lasagna pan with aluminum foil, tented slightly so it doesn't touch the noodles or sauce.

Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes. Uncover in the last 10 minutes if you'd like more of a crusty top or edges.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Homemade lasagna very taste to eat from home

Name: Pork Stew

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description:
In a large pot or dutch oven, brown pork with onions in 1 tablespoon olive oil (it doesn't have to be cooked through).

Remove from pot and set aside.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
Add broth, tomatoes, and spices making sure to scrape up any brown bits from the bottom of the pot.

Add the pork back into the pot and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer covered for 1 hour (or until pork is fairly tender).

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Add potatoes, sweet potatoes, carrots, and mushrooms.

Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer covered for 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

Remove lid and stir in green beans.

Thicken if desired (below) and simmer an additional 10 minutes uncovered.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Pork Stew has good nutritional quality for work out

Name: Grill Chicken

Steps.Name: Getting start
Steps.Description:
In a large bowl, whisk the salt in the water to dissolve.

Add the chicken breasts to the brine.

Put in the refrigerator and chill for 30 minutes.

Steps.Name: First step
Steps.Description:
Arrange your grill so that one side is for high direct heat, and the other side is cooler.

Alternatively, you can use a grill pan, set over medium-high heat.

Remove chicken breasts from brine and pat dry.

Coat with olive oil, and sprinkle evenly with paprika.

Steps.Name: Final step
Steps.Description:
Brush some olive oil on the grill grates.

Place chicken breasts on the hot side of the grill (or on the grill pan).

Let the chicken grill, undisturbed, until the pieces start getting some grill marks (you can lift up one to check).

When the chicken pieces have browned on one side, turn them over, and move them to the cooler side of the grill (low heat, not no heat).

Cover, and let them finish cooking.

Reviews.Description: Awesome recipe

Details: Grill Chicken tasty meal to get out of the simple chicken recipe.
